text: [Music]
well first of all I think when a young
man goes to war and I went for almost
six years in Vietnam in country for
almost six years uh it has it says a lot
about uh how you'll look at the future
for me that experience has made me very
loathe uh to want to go to war again uh
to make sure as far as I'm able that
it's uh that Wars something of The Last
Resort uh beyond that I think it started
me in a direction towards foreign policy
something I wouldn't have even
considered when I was a uh a young
teenager I think you make daily
decisions if not hourly decisions uh
about uh people living and dying uh I
remember one case where I was taking a
wounded Vietnamese uh sailor uh to a
hospital in t in he'd been terribly
wounded while we're on an operation and
he was so badly wounded that I actually
gave him three serett of morphine which
I thought it would kill him but kill him
peacefully uh he not only survived much
to everyone's surprise uh although he
lost his his eyes his ears two arms uh
but he came back to thank me for saving
his life so uh it's funny
